Package com.library.frontend.controllers.admin

Class AddBookQuantityController

java.lang.Object
com.library.frontend.controllers.admin.AddBookQuantityController
All Implemented Interfaces:
Controller, javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class AddBookQuantityController extends Object implements Controller
The AddBookQuantityController class is responsible for managing the user interface interactions related to adding quantity to a book inventory in the library management system. It interacts with the backend AddBookQuantityService to handle the addition of book quantities.

    • addButtonOnMouseClicked

      public void addButtonOnMouseClicked()
      Handles the action when the "Add" button is clicked. Attempts to increase the book quantity based on user input and closes the current window on success.
